name: ARDrone Sim
description:
ARDrone Sim is the first ever flight Simulator of the AR.Drone quadcopter from Parrot!

Practice flying your AR Drone no matter the weather and gain confidence in your flying technique to impress your friends.

Features all the controls of the real AR.Drone!

Features 'THE MAZE'. Can you complete the maze? Be careful, flip your drone and you'll have to start from the beginning again!

Outdoor level. Fly around the trees.

Warehouse level. Fly through the tunnels & try to land on the pallets.

Grand Finale 2012 - Fly on the course of the ARDrone grand finale 2012 held at Las Vegas!

PLEASE NOTE: A few people have complained about a lack of 'Mode 2' on the simulator. Mode 2 is in the simulator, go in to the settings and turn on left hand mode!
